@Test public void testCustomPolicies() throws Exception {     MockEndpoint mock = getMockEndpoint("mock:result").     mock.expectedBodiesReceived("Hello World").     mock.expectedHeaderReceived("A", "A").     mock.expectedHeaderReceived("B", "B").     template.sendBody("direct:start", "Hello World").     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }
@Override public void configure() throws Exception {     from("direct:start").routePolicy(policyA, policyB).to("mock:result"). }

@Override protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             from("direct:start").routePolicy(policyA, policyB).to("mock:result").         }     }. }
